sourceMeaningMnemonic: You can <radical>see</radical> <radical>gold</radical> if you <radical>stand</radical> in front of a <kanji>mirror</kanji>. Yes, you are made of gold. You’re so great and valuable, standing in front of that mirror. It’s not hard to see, especially in a mirror – you’re golden.
meaningInfo: Imagine looking at yourself in the mirror only to see you’re made of gold. It would be pretty shocking. Imagine how surprised you would be.
readingMnemonic: Your name is Amy and you are the CAG (Commander, Air Group) of the Battlestar Galactica. People call you <reading>CAG Amy</reading> (<ja>かがみ</ja>). You have so many gold medals on you that you’ve earned the nickname “Golden CAG Amy.” You like to look at yourself in the <kanji>mirror</kanji> and admire yourself.
readingInfo: Imagine being the CAG of a ship. You are in charge of all the pilots and defending the ship. It’s a lot of responsibility. Can you handle it?
